name: Maison Flaneur
description: A unique online immersive shopping experience

team.name: Gabriel Moukhbat
team.bioHtml: Founder @Maison Flaneur • Worked at @Edenred Capital Partners

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
We have a healthy start-up budget and an experienced team but we're missing one important role - an enthusiastic marketing intern to join our team and help us with the onboarding of our hospitality partners.

What we offer 

•	A proven and funded business model ready to be rolled out
•	All the benefits of the startup world (innovation, ownership, pace) 
•	Hands on experience on business development, sales and marketing and operations

What we are looking for

•	An interest in Ecommerce as well as the travel and leisure industry
•	Familiarity with e-commerce CMS and marketing tools (e.g. Woo commerce, Online analytics and Google Adwords)
•	Strong desire to learn along with professional drive
•	Excellent verbal and written communication skills
•	Current enrollment in a related BS or Masters degree
•	Excellent knowledge of MS Office
•	Previous start-up experience is a plus

Job Brief 

•	Populating and maintaining the website (product upload)
•	Improve and provide ideas on Product Information Management 
•	Social media management - work with the marketing team to promote the brand online
•	Interact with key stakeholders (hotels, restaurants or suppliers) to gather product and marketing information
•	Assist founders on business development by preparing sales presentation and participating to meetings

jobs.title: Front end/Full Stack developer Junior/Intern
jobs.description:
www.maisonflaneur.com is the first e-commerce enabling retail customers to buy the same homeware and furniture found in the best design hotels and restaurants around the world.
To date we have partnered with 15 hospitality venues in New York, Paris, London, and Marrakech, and c.30 suppliers around the world. Our website (www.maisonflaneur.com) offers a modern shopping experience online and has been fully designed and developed by our award winning agency.
We have a healthy start-up budget and an experienced team and we're looking to expand our tech team to accelerate our growth and kick off new projects. 

What we offer 

•	A proven and funded business model ready to be rolled out
•	All the benefits of the startup world (innovation, ownership, pace) 
•	The flexibility to work full time in a startup while supporting an agency (Caracal Studio) on other exciting projects
•	Hands on experience on tech development while working very closely with the founding and marketing teams
•	Package will depend on experience

What we are looking for

•	Located or willing to relocate to Brussels, Belgium to work with the agency
•	Long term intern (break year, alternance, +6 months internship) OR a graduate OR a talented self made Frontend developer 
•	Strong experience with WordPress, PHP, JavaScript and of course HTML/CSS
•	Good sense of design and ability to build pages that look and feel great
•	Good understanding of Ecommerce and marketplace business models
•	Strong desire to learn along with professional drive
•	Excellent verbal and written communication skills
•	Using Sketch is an advantage

Job Brief 

•	Attend weekly calls to discuss website improvements and identify levers to accelerate growth (customer acquisition, processes, supply chain, etc.)
•	Execute 
•	Navigate through websites, identify and fix bugs
•	Come up with recommendations to improve website performance, design, processes, etc.
